## loading packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())
theme_update(legend.position = "bottom")

set.seed(1)
```

## simple funtion
```{r computing z score}
x = rnorm(25)

mean(x)/sd(x)
```

Build a function for this.

```{r building function for z score}
z_score <- function(x) {
  z = mean(x)/sd(x)
  
  z #return item (can also be writen as return(z))
}
```

```{r pluging the values into the function}
# Note that it has to be a vector indicating values to be pluged into the function.
z_score(runif(20,0,1))

# or

z_score(c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE))
```

## Add some control statement
```{r control statements}
z_score <- function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("x must be numeric!")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("x must have 3 or more entries")
  }
  z = mean(x)/sd(x)
  
  z
}
```

```{r}
z_score(rnorm(2))
```

## Output mean and sd as well
```{r adding output}
z_score <- function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("x must be numeric!")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("x must have 3 or more entries")
  }
  mean <- mean(x)
  sd <- sd(x)
  z <- mean/sd
  
  data_frame(mean,
             sd,
             z)
}
```

```{r}
z_score(rnorm(25))
```
